name: Sword of Sun and Moon
introduction: It is too dreamy, too fascinating, representing the ethereal in the starry sky, and the eternity of the universe. Energetic human being, be courage to use Sword of Sun and Moon to explore this dangerous universe.

awaken_skills.name: Shiny Pulse (Divine retribution)
awaken_skills.description: Double the coefficient of M.DMG for the 1st strike

awaken_skills.name: Demon Retreat (Primal force)
awaken_skills.description: For every empty slot in line-up (as 7 enemies deployed), and the Max M.DMG is 1050%.

awaken_skills.name: Twilight
awaken_skills.description: ATK+10%, CRIT+10% (Valid ONLY in Arena, Clash of Titans, Glory Arena, Clash of Guilds, Olympus Legend, Gods Twilight, Conqueror of Legends, and friends battle)
